item.text: Please provide the information for the best point of contact regarding this reservation.
Yes! I would like to receive helpful text messages from Ottehr regarding patient education, events, and general information about our offices. Message frequency varies, and data rates may apply.

answerOption.valueString: Allergic reaction to medication or food
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

extension.valueString: Pronoun responses are kept confidential in our system and are used to help us best respect how our patients wish to be addressed.

item.text: How did you hear about us?

answerOption.valueString: Been there with another family member

item.text: How would you like to pay for your visit?
By choosing to proceed with self-pay without insurance, you agree to pay $100 at the time of service.

By clicking "Continue," I acknowledge that if my employer or their Workers Compensation insurer does not pay for this visit, I am responsible for the charges and may self-pay or have the charges submitted to my personal insurance.
We use this information to help determine your coverage and costs.
Policy holder address is the same as patient's address
Front side of the insurance card (optional)

extension.valueString: Take a picture of the **front side** of your card and upload it here

item.text: Who is paying for the visit?
By choosing to proceed with self-pay without insurance, you agree to pay $100 at the time of service.
If you choose not to enter your credit card information in advance, payment (cash or credit) will be required upon arrival.

A responsible party is the individual responsible for the visit's financial obligations. If the patient is not their own responsible party, then the responsible party must be the patient's legal guardian or legal designee.
Responsible party's address is the same as patient's address

answerOption.valueString: I do not have an attorney

item.text: Please upload a Photo ID, Driver's License, or Passport for an adult, either yourself or the parent/guardian when accompanying a child.
